name: Benetech
overview: Benetech, Inc. provides combustible dust control and material handling solutions. Its products include transfer chutes, scrapers and side skirting products, inspection doors, haul road dust control agents, pile sealants, rail car and truck top sealants, slope stabilizing encrusting agents, coal flow enhancement chemicals, pulse-jet collectors, insertable and bin vent dust collectors, wet dust extraction hoods, manual washdown systems, portable surfactant-based washdown systems, dust disposal and sluicing systems, and fire suppressants and equipment. The company also offers chemical dust control agents, freeze conditioning agents, belt de-icers, sidecar release agents, flue gas conditioning systems, and dry sorbent injection SO2 control systems, as well as combustion enhancement products; and chemical, fog, and mechanical application systems, including sheds, skids, yard sprays, piping, spray manifolds, and foam generators and controls. In addition, Benetech provides advising and consulting services. It serves a range of facilities, including coal-fired generating utilities, mining operations, refineries producing petroleum coke, trans loading facilities, steel mills, cement plants, and aggregate and stone operations. Benetech, Inc. was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Montgomery, Illinois.
